Special Powers
(+5) TIME TO FIND A NEW BODY: When Malice would be KO'd, you may instead replace her with a standard character of 35 points or less from your Sideline on their last non KO click. If you choose a character named Polaris, instead turn that character to click #3. Protected: Pulse Wave.
